subject: Accepted desktop-base 4.0.3 (source all)
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Format: 1.7
Date: Thu, 24 May 2007 01:22:06 +0200
Source: desktop-base
Binary: desktop-base
Architecture: source all
Version: 4.0.3
Distribution: unstable
Urgency: low
Maintainer: Gustavo Franco 
Changed-By: Fathi Boudra 
Description: 
 desktop-base - common files for the Debian Desktop
Changes: 
 desktop-base (4.0.3) unstable; urgency=low
 .
   * Fix kde default wallpaper appearance between kdm to ksplash switch.
Files: 
 9e891cb8aaf692fe5d09462f7a331eeb 627 x11 optional desktop-base_4.0.3.dsc

 d54fd9be30f1d5fa450c250e4f13cf3d 2295366 x11 optional desktop-base_4.0.3_all.deb

Accepted:
desktop-base_4.0.3.dsc
  to pool/main/d/desktop-base/desktop-base_4.0.3.dsc

  to pool/main/d/desktop-base/desktop-base_4.0.3.tar.gz
